snippet.title: Atlus USA Trailer: Dokapon Kingdom
snippet.description:
Party gaming gets a facelift in this exuberant mix of role playing and board games! Battle, steal, and deface the characters of up to 3 friends while racing to become hero of Dokapon Kingdom with no extra equipment required. And after your friendships are destroyed, the game is just as much fun to play alone.

Available Fall 2008.

For more information, visit:
http://www.atlus.com/dokapon
